      • fillArray

        public static java.lang.String[] fillArray(java.lang.String[] arr)
        fills the string array with trailing empty strings.
        used only with converting a string to a visit card object!!
        Parameters:
        arr - The array to fill
        Returns:
        A new array of size 14 with trailing empty strings
